Articles.Content: I just installed Mechjeb2, and I am running into a really annoying problem. Every time I launch a mission with Mechjeb and go back into the VAB via revert or through the space center, the screen turns a light shade of blue.  All of the UIs are still functional, and I can even click on parts (even though I can't see them.)    Mechjeb2 is the only mod I have installed. Does anyone know how to fix this?  My current method is to go into a different building and back, but this takes time.

Strange, MechJeb forum will want this in the dev thread.

Try unistalling Mechjeb and see what happens to confirm if Mechjeb is doing this.
